name: fontview
onCreateCommand: git config user.name $(git --no-pager log --pretty="%an" | head -n 1) && git config user.email $(git --no-pager log --pretty="%ce" | head -n 1) && (test -e geckodriver || ( git clone https://github.com/yeslogic/allsorts && cd allsorts && git checkout -b 0.16.1 && sed -i "31 s@base@pub base@;36 s@base@pub base@" src/binary/read.rs ) ) && cargo clean && cargo build
